def recent_quantum_breakthroughs_2024_2025():
    return [
        'Evidence that dark energy may be weakening (Quanta Magazine, 2024)',
        'Discovery of a supersolid phase of matter (Quanta Magazine, 2024)',
        'Quantum tornadoes confirming paradoxical phase (YouTube/Quanta, 2024)',
        'Entanglement-based imaging and quantum error correction (Physics World, 2024)',
        'Generating quantum spin currents in graphene without magnetic fields (ScienceDaily, June 2025)',
        'Breakthroughs in quantum use cases for defense and semiconductors (McKinsey, June 2025)',
        'Discovery of new class of particles: fractional excitons (Phys.org, January 2025)',
        'Physics Breakthrough of the Year awarded to quantum computing scientists (IOP, December 2024)',
        'Breakthrough in understanding high-temperature superconductors (Simons Foundation, May 2024)',
        'Quantum science events and advancements at LMU München (LMU, February 2025)'
    ]
